00022 #ifndef _CMDINTERPRETER_H
00023 #define _CMDINTERPRETER_H
00024 
00025 #define UINT_MAX 0xffffffff
00026 /* the limit for conversion pf the read output is set to 16bit unsigned
00027  * there is some strange behaviour in the float processing for higher values
00028  * e.g. unsigned int iHex=0xaaaaaaaa; float fVal=iHex;
00029  * gives fVal=2863311616.00 instead of 2863311530
00030  * unsigned int iHex=0xffffff; float fVal=iHex*2 + 1;
00031  * fVal=33554432.00 instead of 33554431
00032  */
00033 #define INT_RO_MAX 0xffff
00034 
00035 int executeCommandArgs(int iNofArgs, const char** arrayArg);
00036 int executeCommandLine(char* pCmdLine);
00037 int terminateBatchProcessing();
00038 
00039 int printHelp();
00040 int printInfo();
00041 
00042 #endif // _CMDINTERPRETER_H
